②姓氏。

鄔字的基本解释

鄔
wū
见“邬”。

鄔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wū］
［《廣韻》哀都切，平模，影。］
［《廣韻》安古切，上姥，影。］
［《廣韻》依倨切，去御，影。］
(1)春秋郑地。在今河南省偃师县西南。
(2)春秋晋地。在今山西省介休县东北。
(3)通“塢”。城堡，堡邬。
(4)姓。春秋晋有邬臧。见《左传·昭公二十八年》。

鄔字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄔； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1275第28
【唐韻】【正韻】安古切【集韻】【韻會】於五切，?音隖。縣名。【左傳·隱十一年】王取鄔、劉、蔿、邘之田于鄭。【註】河南緱氏縣西南有鄔聚。　又晉地。【左傳·昭二十八年】司馬彌牟爲鄔大夫。【註】今汾州介休縣有故鄔城。　又【廣韻】哀都切【集韻】汪胡切，?音烏。又【廣韻】依倨切【集韻】依據切，?音飫。義?同。

考證：〔【左傳·隱十一年】王取鄔劉蔿䢴之田于鄭。〕　謹照原文䢴改邘。

Wu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wū］
["Guangyun" mourning all cut, flat model, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Anguqie, grandma, shadow. ]
["Guang Yun" cuts according to cluelessness, goes to imperial, shadows. ]
(1) Chunqiu Zhengdi. In today's southwest of Yanshi County, Henan Province.
(2) Spring and Autumn Jindi. In today's northeast of Jiexiu County, Shanxi Province.
(3) Through "dock". Castle, Fort Wu.
(4) Last name. There is Wu Zang in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Twenty-eight Years of Zuo Zhuan · Zhaogong".
Wu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　 Wu; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1275 28
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Anguqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] in Wuqie,? Yinfeng. County name. [Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleventh Year] Wang Qu Wu, Liu, Lin, and Huang Zhitian Yu Zheng. [Note] There is Wuju in the southwest of Ruoshi County, Henan.　 Jindi again. [Zuo Twenty-eighth] Sima Mi Mou was Doctor Wu. [Note] Now there is Wucheng in Jiexiu County, Fenzhou.　[Guang Yun] Aidu cut [Ji Yun] Wang Hu cut,? Yinwu. Also [Guangyun] Cut according to the sorrow [Jiyun] Cut according to the sound,? Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Hidden Eleven Years] Wang took Wu, Liu Yi, and Zheng in the field. 〕　I would like to change it according to the original text.
